column5: Came across this article and thought I'd share, those are some comfortable looking huts there! Does the law prevent us from having huts like that in Ontario?  http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/41432433/ns/travel-destination_travel/
there are no laws regarding how you build a hut. but if you build one like that and put it out on simcoe, consider it gone or totally trashed when you return.
That's sad, isn't it?  Maybe it's time to move to Minnesota...
They know how to do it right.  Ya I agree Skeet.Shame really, that happens out there.
